sub_title: Senior Mendix Business Engineer & SAP BTP Cloud Integrator | Low-code, High value
summary:
Mendix Advanced Certified Software DevOps Engineer | SAP Certified Application Associate | ... and a serious IoT enthusiast

Mendix Rapid Application Development
SAP Rapid Application Development by Mendix
SAP Cloud Platform Integration (SAP CPI)
SAP Process Orchestration (PI / PRO) 
Apache Kafka
SAP Cloud Platform IoT Services
SAP Leonardo Innovation Platform
Dell Boomi

After my study Business Information Technology I focused on Systems Integration and Business Process Management with both Mendix Model Driven Development and SAP Process Integration as middleware. With over 20 years of experience in IT and working with SAP solutions since 2009, I can analyze complex problems and suggest a range of possible strategies. After which I can consult with a client to choose an optimal solution. Became the first SAP Certified Partner Presales Consultant in 2014.

I primarily focus on integration around the SCM & Manufacturing processes within SAP and all related EAI, B2B & BPM integration aspects. Integrating SAP and non-SAP systems via SAP NetWeaver Process Integration & Orchestration middleware. I'm very keen on documenting developed services and interfaces in a correct and structured way, but also on following the customers’ design- and architectural conventions. I have broad experience in Agile SCRUM, ITIL and in working with IT Service Management tooling. 

Dell Boomi
- AtomSphere

Mendix
- Model Driven Development
- Certified Mendix Advanced Developer

SAP
- Certified SAP Cloud Platform Integration Developer

Standards & Techniques:
XML / XSD / XSLT / oData / oAuth / REST / JavaScript / HTML / WSDL / SOAP / SoapUI / AS2 / EDI / Agile SCRUM

Home project
Implementing Internet of Things (IoT) and Smart Home Automation using a Raspberry Pi and the Open Source Domoticz project. Also see www.domoticz.com. I also participated in the Kickstarter Project for Homey by Athom, see www.athom.com.

Wireless techniques and protocols I use in this project:
Z-Wave / ZigBee / KaKu 433 mHz / 868 mHz / Bluetooth / BTLE / WiFi

treasury_media.title: Mendix Advanced Certified Professional
treasury_media.description: At this level, we certify using practical exercises that test learners’ knowledge of the platform and their experience using it. With the advanced curriculum, you learn about sub-microflows, UI and UX, mastering microflows, data optimization, advanced domain models and security, error handling and customization, and even specialist topics like app administration, REST API’s, and building an app with SAP.

treasury_media.title: SAP Certified Application Associate - SAP Cloud Platform Integration
treasury_media.description: The "SAP Certified Application Associate - SAP Cloud Platform Integration" certification exam validates that the candidate possesses the fundamental and core knowledge required of the SAP Cloud Platform Integration profile. This certification proves that the candidate has an overall understanding and in‐depth technical skills to participate as a member of a project team in a mentored role.

treasury_media.title: IoT Prototyping
treasury_media.description:
SAP Leonardo
Raspberry Pi 3 Model B

treasury_media.title: Homey by Athom
treasury_media.description: I backed a Kickstarter project called 'Homey'. This nifty device promises to be the hub between the variety of standards existing in today's Home Automation world. It supports 8 different (wireless) technologies like Z-Wave, ZigBee (Philips HUE), WiFi, Bluetooth, 433 MHz (KiKa, CoCo), IR and more...

treasury_media.title: Home Automation
treasury_media.description: Home Automation project based on Raspberry Pi and Domoticz. Standards used: Z-Wave, ZigBee, 433 MHz

projects.title: Avans | FlexPeople
projects.description:
Avans University of Applied Sciences is a Dutch high ranked vocational university. It is located in three cities: Breda, 's-Hertogenbosch, and Tilburg. The school has 30,000 students studying 40 courses in 18 institutes. There are 2,900 employees.

The Mendix application Avans FlexPeople is developing to continuously optimize the hiring process, from the origin of the application to the payment of external employees.

Also, I am part of the work group Release Management within the Avans Developer Guild.

- Mendix 8.x
- WSO2 API Management

projects.title: Heineken International | Center of Excellence Technology
projects.description:
Deliver SAP Integration knowledge and expertise regarding the development and optimization of the global integration landscape within Global Information Services (GIS). Design and development of A2A & B2B interfaces.

Within the HEINEKEN Center of Excellence Technology, physically located in the city center of Amsterdam, I am involved in mostly business initiated projects. These projects often require SAP to Non-SAP and SAP to SAP Systems Integration. In the CoE Technology I am co-responsible for consulting and advising the business, but also design and development of integration solutions according to the HEINEKEN standards and conventions. This includes activities related to acquisitions of breweries worldwide and integration of both SAP to non-SAP & SAP to SAP. Standards used are XML, XSD, Idoc, RFC, BAPI, SOAP, WSDL, sFTP.

projects.title: Philips Lighting | GEMINI
projects.description:
The main goal of Project GEMINI is the disentanglement of Philips Lighting from Philips HealthTech. South LATAM (Chile & Argentina)

Building new interfaces for the South LATAM area (e-Delivery, e-Invoicing, Remito, Supplier Web, Pagos Eficientes) and migrating existing EDI interfaces to the carved-out Lighting kernel. Standards used are EDI, XML, XSLT, Idoc, RFC, FTP.

projects.title: Novoferm | Service Order Process Integration
projects.description:
Design and implement Service Order webservice from Novoferm to their customers. 

Customers of Novoferm wish to automate the process of Service Orders in SAP by using webservices to post their Service Order Requests to Novoferm. This is also important in terms of Service Level Agreements. Standards used are XML, XSD, Idoc, RFC, BAPI, SOAP, WSDL.

contributors.headline: Senior Mendix Business Engineer & SAP BTP Cloud Integrator | Low-code, High value

projects.title: AVEBE | Upgrade SAP NetWeaver PRO 7.4
projects.description:
Documentation of all 22 productive interfaces running on old version of SAP NetWeaver PI 7.0, upgrade integration platform to SAP NetWeaver PO 7.4. This includes migrating all 22 productive interfaces and transform Integration Processes to BPM. Also introduce a 3-tier landscape (DEV/QAS/PRD). 

Migrating and optimizing different interfaces between SAP and third-party applications within the Avebe organization itself or with customer- and supplier systems outside the Avebe domain. Standards used are XML, XSLT, Idoc, RFC, FTP, CIFS, SOAP, WSDL.

projects.title: Stahl | 3PL Logistic Process Integration
projects.description:
Automate all inbound and outbound logistics processes between Stahl Asia Pacific and CWT Singapore via electronic interfaces. 

Stahl Asia Pacific has outsourced its warehouse activities for Finished Goods materials and part of the Raw materials to the 3rd party logistic provider CWT. To be able to effectively perform all inbound and outbound logistics processes, several EDI interfaces had to be developed between Stahl’s SAP system and the CWT WM-system. Standards used are XML, XSD, Idoc, FTP.

⛅ Solution Partner | SAP Business Technology & Integration at ID-PARTNERS

projects.title: CED European Claims Experts | Claims Management Process
projects.description:
Replace legacy AS400 claims management systems. Develop Mendix web applications for claims management and build a corporate integration platform based on Mendix to integrate legacy AS400 systems and other internal and external systems. 

As with many companies in the financial world, the core systems of CED are AS400 database servers from IBM, dating from the 80's. CED wanted to renew this infrastructure partly for cost reasons, but particularly to improve services to insurers. Standards used are SOAP, XML, XSD, flat-file, CSV.

projects.title: Gemeente Zwolle | Generic Case Platform
projects.description: The municipality of Zwolle has implemented the Generic Case Platform (Generiek Platform Zaken, GPZ). This platform provides the citizens of the municipality of Zwolle the opportunity to submit their building permits through a personal portal within the website of the municipality of Zwolle. These applications are submitted using intelligent PDF forms. Through this personal portal, they can see the status of their applications, and the possible need to submit additional documents. For the back office, the Workbench was developed with which applications are processed. Following the introduction of GPZ, a module for applications relating to environmental permits was also developed. Standards used are SOAP, XML, XSD, Adobe LiveCycle Interactive Forms.

contributors.headline: Senior Mendix Business Engineer & SAP BTP Cloud Integrator | Low-code, High value

projects.title: Equens | Development of Adobe Interactive Forms
projects.description: Digitization of paper forms. A large part of the forms could be combined to form the "collection-wizard". These collection-wizard makes it possible to only show the sections of the form which are relevant for a certain application process. This wizard guides the user step-by-step during their request. In total there are 30 intelligent PDF forms designed and built. This solution eliminates the need for printing forms first and filling them in by hand before sending them to Equens. Thanks to the validation checks in the form, the user will immediately get feedback whether the input is valid and if form can be submitted digitally.

contributors.headline: Senior Mendix Business Engineer & SAP BTP Cloud Integrator | Low-code, High value

projects.title: De Nederlandsche Bank | Autoriteit Financiële Markten
projects.description:
Development of intelligent integrity and reliability assessment forms for new policymakers in the financial markets.

Based on the Adobe Intelligent Document Platform intelligent PDF forms have been developed. These forms are part of the process by which new policymakers have to be assessed in the financial market. These policymakers are evaluated with the integrity test for suitability and reliability. This assessment includes a background investigation into the past of the policymaker(s) involved. The entered and validated data is returned in XML format via a secure connection to a webservice of De Nederlandsche Bank (DNB). Standards used are SOAP, XML, XSD, Adobe LiveCycle Interactive Forms.
